entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'associationStatus_display' is added to the 'PropertyAssociation' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'associationStatus'
arguments.name: associationStatus_display

constantValues: Shows the status of the property association.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'inheritanceState_display' is added to the 'PropertyAssociation' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'inheritanceState'
arguments.name: inheritanceState_display

constantValues: Shows the inheritance state in relationship to the parent property.
Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Currency' adds the 'transactionCurrencyId' attribute below to the 'PropertyAssociation' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Shows the currency associated with the record.
